mapper.delete: delete from tbl_svrlst where seq in (${chkdel})
mapper.select:
SELECT seq, svr_nm, svr_domain, svr_ip,
CASE WHEN svr_port is null THEN 'N' WHEN svr_port = '' THEN 'N' ELSE svr_port END as svr_port, svr_dc, insert_dt FROM tbl_svrlst
SELECT seq, svr_nm, svr_domain, svr_ip, svr_dc, svr_port , svr_used, insert_dt FROM tbl_svrlst order by seq desc OFFSET #{pagingVo.limitStart} LIMIT #{pagingVo.recordSize}
SELECT count(*) as tbl_cnt FROM tbl_svrlst
